description: This source file defines a 'Toast' UI component using the LightningJS framework. It creates a visual notification that displays a message, with styling based on the type ('error', 'success') and theme. The component includes props for message, type, and open state, and manages background and text colors accordingly.

classes.name: Toast
classes.description: A LightningJS component for displaying toast notifications with customizable message, type, and visibility.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes component state, setting theme and default colors.

methods.name: created
methods.description: Sets background color based on toast type ('error' or 'success') after component creation.
